module.moduleauthor: Michal Klempa, Mário Mikula, Robert Smetana, Michal Švirec, Matej Vitásek

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Two step, strongly modular implementation of a simplifier: element clustering is followed by regular expression inference. Clustering by element name is implemented, advanced methods (context, content, tree distance) are possible. Regular expression inference using a merging state algorithm with k,h-context equivalency and state removal method are implemented, almost infinite possibilities of extension are available.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Two step, strongly modular implementation of a simplifier.
